name: Command System With Buffer And Scriptable Objects Support
name_original: Command System With Buffer And Scriptable Objects Support
description:
Command System With Buffer And Scriptable Objects Support

(Demo Scene: Similar to the Practice Mode in fighting games

All Commands executed will be displayed on the screen)

Ctrl     / LMB - Fire1 Command

Alt      / RMB - Fire2 Command

Shift   / MMB - Delete Oldest Command

     Combination                     | Chain Command                                 | Description

1 - Fire2Fire2Fire1Fire2        -> EnableDisableGameObjectCommand   : Show/Hide Capsule obj

2 - Fire1Fire1Fire1                -> SetMaterialColorCommand_Black       :  Set Capsule Color to Black

3 - Fire2Fire2Fire2                -> SetMaterialColorCommand_White       :  Set Capsule Color to White 

Try Pressing some buttons to see them in your input buffer!!!
